dcterms:description: A private dataset containing anonymized data from 1669 patients who underwent hip fracture surgery at a public hospital between January 2013 and July 2021. The dataset includes pre-operative and per-operative data, with a focus on predicting 30-day mortality after surgery.
dcterms:title: Private dataset of hip fracture patients

dcterms:creator: W.S. Nijmeijer
E.C. Folbert
M. Vermeer
J.P. Slaets
J.H. Hegeman
dcterms:description: The Almelo Hip Fracture Score (AHFS) is a predictive model for early mortality following hip fracture surgery in frail elderly patients.
dcterms:title: Almelo Hip Fracture Score (AHFS)

dcterms:creator: B. Yenidogan
S. Pathak
J. Geerdink
J.H. Hegeman
M. van Keulen
dcterms:description: Data from a study that developed a multimodal machine learning model for predicting 30-day post-operative mortality of elderly hip fracture patients, utilizing both pre-operative and per-operative data.
dcterms:title: Data from Yenidogan et al.

dcterms:creator: Y. Cao
M.P. Forssten
A. Mohammad Ismail
T. Borg
I. Ioannidis
S. Montgomery
S. Mohseni
dcterms:description: Data from a study that evaluated the predictive values of preoperative characteristics for 30-day mortality in traumatic hip fracture patients.
dcterms:title: Data from Cao et al.
